channel.title: Vykor- beta need players to test for bugs/glitches
channel.description:
[center][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img922/5182/UkK4LC.png[/img][/center]
Vykor has been in development for a while now, and it's time to see what the community thinks of what we've done so far. It's not nearly done, so please be patient with us as we continue to improve the server. Thanks!
[size=18pt]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ifsyvnl27gxepv9/VykorJar%285%29.jar?dl=0[/size]
[video=youtube;WC4_oPQ0dC4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WC4_oPQ0dC4[/video]
[video=youtube;C2oh2cZxz8Q]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C2oh2cZxz8Q&feature=youtu.be[/video]
[video=youtube;JT8Y3jzHXy8]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JT8Y3jzHXy8&feature=youtu.be[/video]
[size=18pt]http://vykor-ps.com/forums/index.php[/size] [CENTER]UPDATES Kraken added, with maps, Zulrah added with maps, many OSRS items added, including trident, Armadyl C'bow, dragon warhammer.[/CENTER] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/7276/gufQKm.png[/img] [b]Features:[/b]
Nightmare Zone minigame
Fight caves & fight pits
Fully working pest control
fully working barrows
Crafting, thieving, fletching, firemaking, cooking, fishing, slayer, woodcutting mining, smithing, runecrafting, herb. (agility, hunter, farming to be added)
Zombie minigame, whole server can play, 21 waves with bosses each wave with scattered zombies that are aggressive, multiple perks, and monkey bombs, and barricades. Very proud of it:)
Duo slayer
6 quests (RFD, DT, cooks assistant, dragon slayer, HFTD, Dorics quest
custom client, with full screen option
Full Godwars maps, with all bosses
multiple bosses (kbd, kq, icequeen dagg kings, chaos elemental
Saradomin sword healing works
Guthans, dh all work just like Runescape
Achievement System
Membership system
[CENTER]watch the YouTube video for minigame footage, below is some more small footage.
Features to be added, osrs bosses, maps, items, more unique content driven minigames. And whatever the community wants.[/CENTER]
[url=https://gyazo.com/776386030831f3bfcc8462d4ffd4cd64]https://gyazo.com/776386030831f3bfcc8462d4ffd4cd64[/url]

[b][size=14pt]Any suggestions, input would be greatly appreciated![/size][/b][/center]

item.title: Vykor- beta need players to test for bugs/glitches
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

[center][center][/center]

Vykor has been in development for a while now, and it’s time to see what the community thinks of what we’ve done so far. It’s not nearly done, so please be patient with us as we continue to improve the server. Thanks!

[size=18pt]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ifsyvnl27gxepv9/VykorJar(5).jar?dl=0[/size]

[video=youtube;WC4_oPQ0dC4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WC4_oPQ0dC4[/video]

[video=youtube;C2oh2cZxz8Q]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C2oh2cZxz8Q&feature=youtu.be[/video]

[video=youtube;JT8Y3jzHXy8]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JT8Y3jzHXy8&feature=youtu.be[/video]

[size=18pt]http://vykor-ps.com/forums/index.php[/size]
[CENTER]UPDATES
Kraken added, with maps, Zulrah added with maps, many OSRS items added, including trident, Armadyl C’bow, dragon warhammer.[/CENTER]

gufQKm.png1073×554

Features:

Nightmare Zone minigame

Fight caves & fight pits

Fully working pest control

fully working barrows

Crafting, thieving, fletching, firemaking, cooking, fishing, slayer, woodcutting mining, smithing, runecrafting, herb. (agility, hunter, farming to be added)

Zombie minigame, whole server can play, 21 waves with bosses each wave with scattered zombies that are aggressive, multiple perks, and monkey bombs, and barricades. Very proud of it:)

Duo slayer

6 quests (RFD, DT, cooks assistant, dragon slayer, HFTD, Dorics quest

custom client, with full screen option

Full Godwars maps, with all bosses

multiple bosses (kbd, kq, icequeen dagg kings, chaos elemental

Saradomin sword healing works

Guthans, dh all work just like Runescape

Achievement System

Membership system

[CENTER]watch the YouTube video for minigame footage, below is some more small footage.

Features to be added, osrs bosses, maps, items, more unique content driven minigames. And whatever the community wants.[/CENTER]
